post:
Hi LET!

I just spent 8 hours last night working on the new server! Let's hope you guys appreciate my effort, ok? :P.

So, here are the full specs for the new server in Los Angeles:
E3 1240v6
32GB RAM
4x1TB SSD @ RAID 5
1 Gbps network - the server is hosted at ReliableSite (Los Angeles, California, USA), peering is excellent to Europe, USA and Asia.
ReliableSite seemed a good fit for the new location as support, network and hardware quality pleases us. We only offer you the best of the best.

I decided to reserve another 200GB out of the 2.7TB we have available for another shared hosting lifetime deal. 
Right now, we offer two locations, Germany EU and Los Angeles USA, the order links will allow you to select the location where you'd like to provision your service.
All our offers include DirectAdmin, MailChannels, LiteSpeed, LSCache, LiteMage, Let's Encrypt and Softaculous.

----------

Coupon code: 50OFF

Unlimited Emails, FTP Accounts, Domains, etc.
